index.name: java
index.subtitle: Java
index.about: Java is the foundation for virtually every type of networked application and is the global standard for developing and delivering embedded applications, games, Web content, and enterprise software. With more than 9 million developers worldwide, Java enables you to efficiently develop and deploy exciting applications and services.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about Java language and some of his framework.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 1 - Introduction/Setup
videos.description: This screencast explains about the JSF (Java Server Faces) and how to setup a project with this framework.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 2 - First Project
videos.description: This screencast will teach you how to create a simple project using JSF.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 3 - Simple Form/Navigation Rules
videos.description: This screencast will teach you about simple form components and navigation rules.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 4 - Managed Bean
videos.description: This screencast explains about how to manage beans.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 5 - Ajax in JSF
videos.description: This screencast explains how to make Ajax calls using JSF.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 6 - Calling methods in JSF
videos.description: This screencast explains how to call object's methods with JSF.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 7 - Including another JSF file
videos.description: This screencast explains how to JSF files inside a main JSF file.

videos.title: Java Server Faces Tutorial 8 - User Interface Components in JSF
videos.description: This screencast will teach you about UI components in JSF.

videos.title: Hibernate Tutorial 1 - Introduction/Setup
videos.description: This video explains about the main concepts of Hibernate framework and how to setup a Hibernate project.

videos.title: Hibernate Tutorial 2 - Saving data into database
videos.description: This video explains how to persists data in a database using Hibernate.

videos.title: Hibernate Tutorial 3 - Getting records from database
videos.description: This video explains how to run queries in a database using Hibernate.

videos.title: Java 8: Lambdas and new APIs
videos.description: This talk will show you some new concepts about Lambdas, Streams, Collectors and Java.time from Java 8.

videos.title: Java 8's JVM
videos.description: In this talk you will learn what has changed in JVM from Java 8.

videos.title: Introduction OOP
videos.description: Let's learn the OOP (Object Oriented Programming) basic using Java.

videos.title: Object Introduction
videos.description: In this episode you will learn the basics about Java objects.

videos.title: Class
videos.description: In this video let's learn about how to build classes.

videos.title: Class attributes
videos.description: A short video about attribute classes for beginners.

videos.title: Functions and Methods
videos.description: A good video about how to handle with functions and methods.

videos.title: Parameters and arguments
videos.description: This is the second video about functions and methods, now explaining what are parameters and arguments.

videos.title: Instances
videos.description: In this video you will learn how to initialize a class creating an object's instance.

videos.title: Overloading methods
videos.description: A good video which explains how to overloading methods.

videos.title: Instances
videos.description: In this video you will learn how to initialize a class creating an object's instance.
